commitment.description: We're committed to maintaining the highest standards of service, ensuring secure transactions, and fostering a marketplace built on trust and quality. Every purchase on Luzimarket directly supports Mexican entrepreneurs and helps preserve traditional crafts for future generations.
commitment.title: Our Commitment

difference.curation: Carefully curated selection of unique, high-quality products
difference.directSupport: Direct support to Mexican small businesses and artisans
difference.experience: Personalized shopping experience with gift recommendations
difference.title: What Makes Us Different

join.description: Whether you're looking for the perfect gift or you're a vendor ready to share your creations with the world, Luzimarket is here for you.
join.title: Join Our Community

About.metaDescription: Learn the story of Luzimarket, the marketplace that connects Mexican artisans with people looking for unique and special gifts.

mission.description: To create a thriving marketplace that celebrates Mexican craftsmanship, supports local entrepreneurs, and makes gift-giving more meaningful by connecting people with unique, handcrafted products that carry the spirit of Mexico.
mission.title: Our Mission

commitment.content: We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of quality and service, complying with all Mexican regulations including PROFECO and the Federal Law for the Protection of Personal Data.

quality.description: Each product goes through a verification process to ensure it meets our standards.
quality.title: Guaranteed Quality

service.description: Our team is available to help you at every step of your shopping experience.
service.title: Exceptional Service

transparency.description: Clear prices, fair policies, and honest communication in every interaction.
transparency.title: Total Transparency

commitment.title: Our Commitment

companyInfo.compliance: We operate in compliance with all Mexican e-commerce and consumer protection laws.
companyInfo.title: Company Information

curation.description: We're not just another marketplace. Every vendor and product is carefully selected to ensure exceptional quality and originality. Our team of curators searches for the best proposals from all over Mexico.
curation.title: Expert Curation

experience.description: We understand that each gift is unique. That's why we offer personalized recommendations, special packaging options, and the ability to include personalized messages to make each delivery unforgettable.
experience.title: Personalized Experience

localSupport.description: We work directly with Mexican artisans and small business owners, ensuring they receive fair treatment and growth opportunities. Your purchase has a direct impact on families and communities.
localSupport.title: Real Local Support

trust.description: With secure payment processing through Stripe, multiple payment options including OXXO, and clear return policies, shopping at Luzimarket is easy and safe.
trust.title: Trust and Security

joinUs.content: Whether you're looking for the perfect gift or you're a creator who wants to share your talent with the world, Luzimarket is your place. Together, we're redefining the art of giving in Mexico.
joinUs.title: Join Our Community

mission.content: To facilitate connections between people through curated gifts that celebrate Mexican craftsmanship, support local entrepreneurs, and create memorable moments for every special occasion.
mission.title: Our Mission

story.paragraph1: Luzimarket was born from a passion for celebrating life's special moments and the desire to support talented Mexican artisans and entrepreneurs. Founded recently, our mission is to create a bridge between those seeking unique and meaningful gifts and the creators who put their heart into every piece.
story.paragraph2: We believe that every gift tells a story. That's why we carefully select vendors who share our vision of quality, authenticity, and attention to detail. From handcrafted jewelry to gourmet products, from decorative art to memorable experiences, every product at Luzimarket has been chosen for its ability to create unforgettable moments.
story.paragraph3: We are more than a marketplace; we are a community that celebrates Mexican creativity, supports fair trade, and facilitates meaningful connections through the art of giving.
story.title: Our Story

authenticity.description: Each product tells a real story, made with passion and dedication by Mexican hands.
authenticity.title: Authenticity

community.description: We foster lasting relationships between creators, buyers, and our platform.
community.title: Community

sustainability.description: We promote responsible practices and support vendors committed to the environment.
sustainability.title: Sustainability

vision.content: To be the leading platform in Mexico for discovering and sharing extraordinary gifts, transforming the way people express love, gratitude, and celebration while driving the growth of Mexican artisanal talent.
vision.title: Our Vision

story.paragraph1: Luzimarket was born from a simple belief: every gift should tell a story. In a world of mass-produced items, we saw an opportunity to connect thoughtful gift-givers with Mexico's talented artisans and unique vendors.
story.paragraph2: Founded recently, we started as a small marketplace with just a handful of vendors. Today, we're proud to support hundreds of Mexican small businesses, from traditional craftspeople to innovative designers, all united by their commitment to quality and authenticity.
story.paragraph3: Our name, Luzimarket, combines 'luz' (light) with 'market', reflecting our mission to shine a light on Mexico's hidden gems and bring them to a wider audience.
story.title: Our Story

About.subtitle: Connecting hearts through extraordinary gifts made in Mexico
About.tagline: Connecting Mexico's finest artisans with gift-givers around the world
About.title: About Luzimarket

dataCollection.description: We collect the following types of personal data:
dataCollection.paymentInfo: Payment information: processed securely through Stripe (we do not store card details)
dataCollection.personalInfo: Personal identification: name, email, phone number, address
dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.transactionInfo: Transaction history: orders, shipping details, purchase preferences

dataProtection.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data, including SSL encryption, secure servers, and restricted access to personal information. Payment processing is handled by Stripe, which is PCI-DSS compliant.
dataProtection.title: Data Security

dataUse.customerService: Providing customer support and responding to inquiries
dataUse.description: We use your personal data for:
dataUse.legalCompliance: Complying with legal obligations and protecting our rights
dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information

Privacy.intro: At Luzimarket (operated by MOMENTO ESPECIAL SAPI DE CV), we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data in accordance with the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties (LFPDPPP) of Mexico.
Privacy.introduction: At MOMENTO ESPECIAL SAPI DE CV ("Luzimarket"), we are committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of our users. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information in accordance with the Federal Law for the Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties (LFPDPPP) and its Regulations.
Privacy.metaDescription: Learn how Luzimarket protects your personal data and privacy when shopping on our platform.

arcoRights.howToExercise: To exercise your ARCO rights, send a request to privacy@luzimarket.shop with your official identification and a clear description of your request. We will respond within a maximum of 20 business days.
arcoRights.intro: As a personal data holder, you have the right to exercise the following ARCO rights:

access.description: Know what personal data we have about you and how we use it
access.title: Access

cancellation.description: Request deletion of your personal data from our databases
cancellation.title: Cancellation

opposition.description: Object to the processing of your personal data for specific purposes
opposition.title: Opposition

rectification.description: Request correction of your personal information when it is inaccurate or incomplete
rectification.title: Rectification

arcoRights.title: ARCO Rights

changes.content: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with the update date. We recommend that you periodically review this policy to stay informed about how we protect your information.
changes.title: Changes to this Policy

contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or about the processing of your personal data, contact us:
contact.title: Contact

cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your browsing experience, analyze platform usage, and personalize content. You can configure your browser to reject cookies, although this may affect some site functionality.
cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies

dataCollected.intro: To provide you with our services, we collect the following personal data:

items.contactData: Contact data: email address, phone number, shipping and billing address
items.navigationData: Navigation data: IP address, browser type, pages visited, time spent
items.paymentData: Financial data: credit/debit card information (securely processed through Stripe)
items.personalData: Identification data: full name, date of birth, gender

dataCollected.title: Personal Data We Collect

dataController.content: The controller responsible for processing your personal data is:
dataController.title: Data Controller

dataSharing.intro: We may share your personal data with third parties in the following cases:

parties.authorities: Competent authorities when required by law
parties.shipping: Courier and logistics companies for product delivery
parties.stripe: Stripe, Inc. for secure payment processing (including OXXO payments)
parties.vendors: Vendors on our platform to process and deliver your orders

dataSharing.title: Data Transfer

inai.content: If you believe that your right to personal data protection has been violated, you may file a complaint with the National Institute of Transparency, Access to Information and Protection of Personal Data (INAI):
inai.title: National Institute of Transparency

legalBasis.content: The processing of your personal data is based on your consent and/or the contractual relationship you maintain with us when using our platform. For certain purposes, processing is based on compliance with legal obligations or our legitimate interest.
legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing

minors.content: Our services are not directed to persons under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors. If you are a parent or guardian and you know that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us to delete such data.
minors.title: Minors

paymentProcessing.oxxoInfo: For cash payments through OXXO, we only collect the information necessary to generate your payment reference. OXXO payments cannot be refunded and have a limit of 10,000 MXN per transaction.
paymentProcessing.security: All payment information is transmitted through secure SSL/TLS connections.
paymentProcessing.stripeInfo: We use Stripe as our payment processor. Stripe complies with the highest PCI-DSS security standards. Your payment information is tokenized and encrypted, and we never directly store your card data.
paymentProcessing.title: Payment Processing

items.customerService: Provide customer service and resolve questions or complaints
items.fraudPrevention: Prevent fraud and ensure transaction security
items.improvements: Improve our services and user experience
items.legalCompliance: Comply with legal obligations and authority requirements
items.marketing: Send you promotional communications and personalized offers (with your consent)
items.processOrders: Process your orders and manage product delivery

retention.content: We will retain your personal data for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy and in accordance with the periods established by applicable legislation. Transaction data will be retained for at least 5 years to comply with tax obligations.
retention.title: Data Retention

security.content: We implement technical, administrative, and physical security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, alteration, or destruction. This includes encryption, firewalls, restricted access, and staff training.
security.title: Data Security

thirdParties.analytics: Analytics services: to improve our platform (anonymized data only)
thirdParties.description: We share your data only with:
thirdParties.shipping: Shipping providers: to deliver your orders
thirdParties.stripe: Stripe: for secure payment processing (including OXXO payments)
thirdParties.title: Third Party Sharing

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy

userRights.access: Access: request information about your personal data
userRights.deletion: Cancellation: request deletion of your data
userRights.description: Under Mexican law, you have the right to:
userRights.opposition: Opposition: object to certain uses of your data
userRights.portability: Portability: receive your data in a structured format
userRights.rectification: Rectification: correct inaccurate or incomplete data
userRights.title: Your Rights (ARCO Rights)

Terms.introduction: Welcome to Luzimarket, a digital marketplace that connects buyers with independent vendors in Mexico. By accessing and using our platform, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services. These terms constitute a legal agreement between you and MOMENTO ESPECIAL SAPI DE CV, operator of the Luzimarket platform.

liability.description: Luzimarket serves as a marketplace connecting buyers and vendors. We are not responsible for the quality, safety, or legality of products listed by independent vendors.
liability.title: Limitation of Liability

Terms.metaDescription: Read the terms and conditions of use for Luzimarket, the curated gift marketplace in Mexico.

platformUse.account: Provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
platformUse.description: When using Luzimarket, you agree to:
platformUse.eligibility: Meet the minimum age requirement of 18 years
platformUse.prohibited: Not engage in fraudulent, illegal, or harmful activities
platformUse.title: Use of the Platform

profeco.description: As a Mexican e-commerce platform, we comply with all PROFECO regulations. For consumer complaints:
profeco.title: PROFECO Consumer Protection

purchases.confirmation: Order confirmation will be sent to your registered email
purchases.description: All prices are displayed in Mexican Pesos (MXN) and include applicable taxes.
purchases.oxxo: OXXO payments have a maximum limit of 10,000 MXN and expire after 3 days
purchases.payment: We accept credit/debit cards and OXXO payments through Stripe
purchases.pricing: Prices are subject to change without notice
purchases.title: Purchases and Payments

returns.conditions: Products must be unused, with tags and original packaging
returns.period: You have 30 days to return products in original condition
returns.process: Contact support@luzimarket.shop to initiate a return
returns.refunds: Refunds are processed within 10 business days after receiving the return
returns.title: Returns and Refunds

acceptance.content: By registering, browsing, or making purchases on Luzimarket, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with these terms, you should not use our Platform.
acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms

cancellations.content: You can cancel your order within 24 hours of purchase, provided the vendor has not started processing. For orders with pending OXXO payment, cancellation is automatic if payment is not completed within the established timeframe.
cancellations.title: Cancellations

contact.intro: For questions about these Terms and Conditions, contact us:
contact.title: Contact

descriptions.marketplace: "Marketplace" - digital platform that facilitates transactions between buyers and independent vendors
descriptions.platform: refers to the luzimarket.shop website and all its mobile applications and related services
descriptions.platformFee: "Platform Fee" - percentage charged to vendors for each successful transaction (typically 15% of sale value)
descriptions.products: items, gifts, and merchandise offered for sale on the Platform by third-party vendors
descriptions.services: all services provided by Luzimarket, including transaction facilitation, payment processing, and customer support
descriptions.user: any person who accesses or uses the Platform
descriptions.Vendor: independent merchants who offer their products through our Platform

disputeResolution.intro: In case of dispute, the parties will first seek an amicable solution. If no agreement is reached, the dispute will be submitted to mediation before resorting to judicial proceedings.
disputeResolution.profeco: Consumers always retain their right to go to PROFECO for consumer dispute resolution.
disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution

governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United Mexican States. Any dispute will be resolved in the competent courts of Mexico City, expressly waiving any other jurisdiction that may apply.
governingLaw.title: Governing Law

indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Luzimarket, its officers, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, or expenses (including legal fees) arising from your use of the Platform or violation of these Terms.
indemnification.title: Indemnification

intellectualProperty.content: All Platform content, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is owned by MOMENTO ESPECIAL SAPI DE CV or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written permission.
intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property

liability.intro: Luzimarket acts as an intermediary between buyers and sellers. We are not responsible for:

limitations.accuracy: The accuracy of information provided by vendors
limitations.availability: The continuous availability of the Platform
limitations.disputes: Disputas directas entre compradores y vendedores
limitations.platformFees: Los vendedores son responsables del pago de comisiones de plataforma
limitations.quality: The quality, safety, or legality of listed products
limitations.shipping: Retrasos o da√±os en el env√≠o causados por vendedores o empresas de mensajer√≠a
limitations.thirdParty: Actions or omissions of third parties, including vendors and shipping services
limitations.vendorActions: Las acciones, omisiones o incumplimientos de los vendedores

liability.maxLiability: En cualquier caso, la responsabilidad total de Luzimarket no exceder√° el valor de la transacci√≥n espec√≠fica en cuesti√≥n.
liability.title: Limitation of Liability

fees.content: Luzimarket charges vendors a commission for each successful sale (typically 15% of sale value). This commission covers platform services, payment processing, customer support, and technology maintenance. Prices shown to buyers already include all costs.
fees.title: Platform Fees

marketplaceModel.important: IMPORTANT: Luzimarket is not the seller of the products. Each purchase constitutes a direct contract between you and the individual vendor. Luzimarket acts solely as an intermediary to facilitate these transactions.
marketplaceModel.intro: Luzimarket operates as a digital marketplace that:

roles.curator: Carefully selects vendors that meet our quality standards
roles.facilitator: Facilitates connections between buyers and independent vendors
roles.paymentProcessor: Processes payments securely through Stripe Connect

marketplaceModel.title: Marketplace Model

modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after publication on the Platform. Your continued use of Luzimarket after changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.
modifications.title: Modifications to Terms

payment.intro: We accept the following payment methods:

methods.cards: Credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) through Stripe
methods.oxxo: Cash payments at OXXO stores (limit of 10,000 MXN per transaction)

payment.oxxoDetails: OXXO payments must be completed within 7 days after generating the reference. OXXO payments are non-refundable and subject to OXXO policies.
payment.stripe: All card payments are securely processed by Stripe, Inc., complying with PCI-DSS standards. Luzimarket does not store credit card information.
payment.title: Payment Methods

platformUse.intro: By using Luzimarket, you agree to:

rules.accuracy: Provide true, accurate, and complete information
rules.age: Be over 18 years old or have the consent of your parents or guardians
rules.lawful: Use the Platform only for legal purposes and in accordance with these Terms
rules.respect: Not interfere with the operation of the Platform or attempt to access restricted areas

platformUse.title: Platform Use

availability.content: Product availability is subject to change. We reserve the right to limit purchase quantities. If a product is not available after placing your order, we will notify you and offer replacement or refund options.
availability.title: Availability

pricing.content: All prices are expressed in Mexican pesos (MXN) and include VAT. Prices may change without notice, but changes will not affect already confirmed orders. The final price includes applicable taxes but does not include shipping costs, which will be calculated during checkout.
pricing.title: Pricing

steps.browse: Browse and select products from our curated vendors
steps.cart: Add products to your shopping cart
steps.checkout: Proceed to checkout and provide shipping information

registration.content: To make purchases, you must create an account by providing accurate and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
registration.title: Account Registration

items.condition: The product must be in original condition, unused and with tags
items.packaging: Must include original packaging and accessories
items.timeframe: You have 30 calendar days from receipt to request a return

returns.intro: Our return policy complies with the Federal Consumer Protection Law and PROFECO:

nonReturnable.content: Some personalized, perishable, or personal hygiene products are not eligible for return as permitted by law.
nonReturnable.title: Non-Returnable Products

steps.authorization: Wait for authorization and return number
steps.contact: Contact the vendor through the platform
steps.ship: Ship the product according to vendor instructions

returns.title: Returns and Refunds

details.costs: Costs calculated based on weight, dimensions, and destination

shipping.intro: Products are shipped by individual vendors. Shipping times and costs vary according to:
shipping.responsibility: Luzimarket facilitates the transaction but is not responsible for shipping delays caused by the vendor or courier company. We recommend reviewing each vendor's shipping policies before purchasing.
shipping.title: Shipping and Delivery

termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account and access to the Platform at any time, with or without cause, and without prior notice. Upon termination, your right to use the Platform will cease immediately.
termination.title: Termination

warranties.intro: Products sold on Luzimarket are covered by the legal warranties established in the Federal Consumer Protection Law. Additionally, some products may include additional manufacturer or vendor warranties.
warranties.profeco: As a consumer, you have the right to file complaints with PROFECO if you believe your rights have been violated. Luzimarket will cooperate with authorities in dispute resolution.
warranties.title: Warranties

shipping.costs: Free shipping on orders over 1,000 MXN
shipping.description: We ship throughout Mexico with the following conditions:
shipping.times: Estimated delivery: 3-10 business days depending on location
shipping.title: Shipping and Delivery
shipping.zones: Shipping costs vary by zone (Zone A: 89 MXN, Zone B: 119 MXN, Zone C: 149 MXN)

Terms.title: Terms and Conditions

approval.accessInfo: You can now access your vendor panel with the following credentials:
approval.message: We are pleased to inform you that your application to join Luzimarket as a vendor has been approved.
approval.passwordInfo: The one you registered during application
approval.questions: If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.
approval.subject: Your application has been approved! - Luzimarket
approval.title: Welcome to Luzimarket!

VendorRegistration.confirmationMessage: You will soon receive a confirmation and response from LUZIMARKET¬Æ to follow up on your platform application.

rejection.accessInfo: If you applied with an account, you can still access your dashboard:
rejection.decision: After reviewing your application, we have decided not to proceed with it at this time.
rejection.invitation: We invite you to reapply in the future when you've updated your catalog or when we open new categories.
rejection.message: We appreciate your time and effort in applying to Luzimarket.
rejection.passwordInfo: The one you registered during application
rejection.questions: If you have questions about this decision, please don't hesitate to contact us.
rejection.reason: This may be due to various factors, including alignment with our current product curation.
rejection.subject: Update on your application - Luzimarket
rejection.thanks: Thank you for your interest in joining Luzimarket as a vendor.
rejection.title: Application Update
rejection.welcome: We hope to collaborate in the future.
